name: Ralph's Terrible Mistake
description:
To install:

Windows: Download and unzip the RTM_Windows.zip file. This should have the RTM .exe and .pck file. Run the .exe and you will be enjoying our game!

Linux:  Download and unzip the RTM_Linux.zip file. This should have a .pck and .x86_64 file. Run the .x86 and you will be enjoying our game! 

Controls: WASD and Left mouse button. Player rotation follows mouse.

View the code on Github: https://github.com/mreil617/OpenGameJam

Tools Used:

Github, GIMP, Godot, and Atom

Assets and Sound:

Kenney Vleugels - Pirate Pack
Kenney Vleugels - Topdown (Shooter) Pack
Kenney Vleugels - Space Shooter (Redux, plus fonts and sounds)
Kenney Vleugels - Space Shooter Extension
Kenney Vleugels - Alien UFO pack
Craftpix - 2D Game Alien Character
Rawdanitsu - Lasers and Beams
Shashank Singh - Key

If you played,

Thank you for taking some time to give this game a go. We really appriciate any feedback you give! This was our first game jam. We have tried making various games in the past but never really finished them. Participating in this jam gave us a strict timeline and boy did we cut it close!! It might not be perfect but we are very proud of our work. We hope you had fun playing our game! Let us know your thoughts in the comments below.

Thank you for playing our Open Jam 2019 game,

Frog and Sno0pyP
